ygData.subject: hunting ideas (was Najena)
ygData.msgSnippet: Try Permafrost or icy orcs at the temple in Everfrost. Not many folks there and there s an invisible NPC in the icy orc temple...found him playing my druid
ygData.messageBody:
Try Permafrost or icy orcs at the temple in Everfrost.

Not many folks there and there's an invisible NPC in
the icy orc temple...found him playing my druid (using
Tracking skill). Icy Orcs con red to a 20th lvl druid
so not sure what he's doing there (name is something
Redwind....)

Anybody know about this?



--- Pinen <ubersorcerer@...> wrote:
> As a casual player I'm having a hard time getting
> out of 23rd level is this
> the place for me I'm currently in Sol A but keep
> dieing...I can solo in SK
> and Lake rathe with little or no problem but exp is
> sloooooooooooow and
> finding an open spot in LR is hard.
> Pinen
> 23 bard
